page.title: 27Football In 2011
page.content:
Football is one of the most popular sports in the whole world.

Cristiano Ronaldo is one of the best footballers in the world as well as L.Messi, A. Young and David villa.

In LIGA BBVA Barcelona came 1st Real Madrid came 2nd and Valencia.

In The Champions League Barcelona came 1st yet again.

Runners up were Man u Defeating R. Madrid to get to the final.

Man united Have signed A. Young, Phil Jones and have signed David de gea.

Man City won the FA cup. Birmingham won the Carlings cup.

Manchester United won the premier league. Runners up were Chelsea and Man city came 3rd.



Cristiano Ronaldo, who plays for R. Madrid, is worth £80 Million pound!!! L. Messi, Who plays for Barcelona, is worth £95 Million pound!!!

If you want to play for a football team then try signing up for Arnold town or Bestwood park Rangers!

My Favourite football team is , Forest, Man United or F.C Barcelona.

My Favourite football player is L.Messi or C.Ronaldo.



Gladehill Football team practise on the there school field. We play against Southglade, Warren and Haden. Our manager is Mr Connolly and he is very competitive as well as the team!!


Class 6 From Gladhill
